alert.note: Alert for Lee; Phillips; St. Francis (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 8:26AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lee, southwestern St. Francis and northeastern Phillips Counties through 900 AM CDT... At 826 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wheatley, or 7 miles northeast of Brinkley, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Forrest City, Marianna, Madison, Palestine, Caldwell, Wheatley, Lexa, Moro, Rondo, Aubrey, Haynes, Garret Grove, Brickeys, New Salem, Lagrange, Cody, Haleside, New Castle, Soudan and Vineyard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
